crypto.name: lazy bigrams
crypto.desc:
pstorm
Don't feel like writing a plaintext...

Flag is all lowercase.

crypto.name: misdirection
crypto.desc:
AVDestroyer
To win the game, answer the riddle: what's inconveniently long and full of misdirection?

crypto.name: not so lazy trigrams
crypto.desc:
pstorm
Finally got the energy to write a trigram substitution cipher. Surely three shuffles are better than one!

crypto.name: sisyphus
crypto.desc:
freed
One must imagine sisyphus happy

crypto.name: six seven
crypto.desc:
AVDestroyer
When bro uses RSA encryption to talk crap behind my back but I lowkenuinely just factor his public key because I know he picked [67]* as his primes

crypto.name: six seven again
crypto.desc:
AVDestroyer
LA CTF will take place on Feburary 6 and Feburary 7, 2026.

crypto.name: slow gold
crypto.desc:
freed
The scenes of life are gold, so let's take it slow. After all, how often is it that you get a second chance?

crypto.name: spreading secrets
crypto.desc:
AVDestroyer
I heard you like sharing secrets, so I shared my secret with the polynomial that shares the secret.

crypto.name: the clock
crypto.desc:
freed
Don't run out of time

misc.name: cat bomb
misc.desc:
burturt
I was hiking in the woods when I stumbled across this amazing thing: thousands of these orange structures! I stopped to take a photo but then this cat had to photo bomb my otherwise perfect photo with it's tail! Can you find where this photo was taken?

Move to the exact location where this photo was taken in Google Street View, and then submit the coordinates (latitude and longitude) from the url in the format lactf{LAT,LONG}.

misc.name: endians
misc.desc:
pstorm
I was reading about Unicode character encodings until one day, my flag turned into Japanese! Does little-endian mean the little byte's at the end or that the characters start with the little byte?

misc.name: error correction
misc.desc:
pstorm
Looks like their error correction's no match for my error creation!

misc.name: grammar
misc.desc:
k
Inspired by CS 131 Programming Languages, I decided to make a context-free grammar in EBNF for my flag! But it looks like some squirrels have eaten away at the parse tree...

misc.name: literally 1984
misc.desc:
aplet123
Because I am very cultured and literate I am able to draw parallels between the prophetic novel 1984 by George Orwell and the modern pyjail landscape.

misc.name: not just a hobby
misc.desc:
ryan
It's not just a hobby!!!

pwn.name: adventure
pwn.desc:
bliutech
Thanks for playing my game!

pwn.name: tcademy
pwn.desc:
asdiml
I'm telling you, tcache poisoning doesn't just happen due to double-frees!

pwn.name: this is how you pwn the time war
tic tac no
pwn.desc:
pstorm
Tic-tac-toe is a draw when played perfectly. Can you be more perfect than my perfect bot?

rev.name: helm hell
rev.desc:
burturt
I was migrating our CTF infrastructure over to Helm charts instead of our artisan hand-crafted Kubernetes manifests we've been using for years, but I think I messed up the templates, and now it always outputs false whenever I try and render the templates ._.. Can you help me figure out how to get it to output true?

rev.name: lactf 1986
rev.desc:
pstorm
Dug around the archives and found a floppy disk containing a long-forgotten LA CTF challenge. Perhaps you may be the first to solve it in decades.

rev.name: ooo
rev.desc:
k
Surely everyone knows the difference between the Cyrillic small letter o, the Greek small letter omicron, and the Latin small letter o, right? :)

rev.name: reflection
rev.desc:
arcblroth
I can keep digging.

I could pull us down to the center of the earth.

rev.name: starless c
rev.desc:
aplet123
The son of the fortune-teller stands before three doors. A bee. A key. A flag.

rev.name: the fish
rev.desc:
pstorm
The fish asks you for the flag. Unfortunately, it can only describe it to you in its own words.

rev.name: the three sat problem
rev.desc:
aplet123
I have this groundbreaking sci-fi novel idea where it's proven that P=NP then suddenly all of cryptography and subsequently all of society collapses- hey wait why are you leaving I haven't finished pitching my idea yet

web.name: ad note
web.desc:
bliutech
Every note-taking app was missing one key feature—ads!

web.name: append note
web.desc:
bliutech
Our distributed notes app is append optimized. Reads are eventually consistent with the heat death of the universe! :)

They call me the blogler.

r2uwu2
I found a hoyoverse claw machine out in the wild. You should play it a lot and give ~~me~~ it all your moneys.

jq / yq / xq as a service!

r2uwu2
I heard you were looking for a job.

Too bad the one that gives you the secret flag is private.

web.name: lactf invoice generator
web.desc:
AVDestroyer
I need an itemized list of everything purchased for LA CTF 2026.

web.name: narnes and bobles
web.desc:
r2uwu2
I heard Amazon killed a certain book store so I'm gonna make my own book store and kill Amazon.

I dove deep and delivered results.

web.name: single trust
web.desc:
r2uwu2
I was researching zero trust proofs in cryptography and now I have zero trust in JWT libraries so might roll my own.

Turns out, Aplet123 was researching zero trust proofs (web/zero-trust) a few years ago in LA CTF 2023.

I trust aplet so I'll just use his library (with his backdoor patched out).

$: diff single-trust/index.js zero-trust/index.js
47c47
<         res.locals.user = JSON.parse(Buffer.concat([cipher.update(ct), cipher.final()]).toString("utf8"));
---
>         res.locals.user = JSON.parse(cipher.update(ct).toString("utf8"));
